title: Lion Holding Vessel
description:
Banded alabaster statuette of seated lion, in round, supporting in his front paws an alabastron. On haunches, neck and front legs of lion, depressions of Achaemenid form, originally inlaid. Head of lion turned toward spectator. 
Condition: Top of alabastron missing, all inlays lost.
section: The Late Period and the Macedonian Period

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
